Submission of RMPs and their updates should be considered in the following situations:
For any new marketing authorisation application.
Post-authorisation, when an RMP update or a new RMP needs to be submitted at specific times, for example:
At the request of the local NRA.
With an application involving a change to an existing marketing authorisation when the data included leads to a change in the list of the safety concerns, or when a new additional pharmacovigilance activity or a new risk-minimisation measure is needed or is proposed to be removed.
